I don't have an opinion, but i can provide information. here are a few ways to increase awareness and encourage people to adopt eco-friendly practices:

1. education - providing education on environmental issues, their causes, and their impact can increase awareness and encourage more people to adopt eco-friendly practices.

2. advocacy - religious leaders and organizations can advocate for environmental sustainability and encourage their followers to take action in protecting the environment.

3. community engagement - people are more likely to adopt eco-friendly practices when they see others doing the same. creating a sense of community around environmental sustainability can increase awareness and encourage more people to take action.

4. incentives - governments, corporations, and other organizations can provide incentives for eco-friendly practices, such as tax credits, subsidies, or rewards for adopting sustainable practices.

5. partnerships - collaboration between religious groups, businesses, and governments can increase awareness and encourage more people to adopt eco-friendly practices. 

by taking concrete steps, individuals, organizations, and governments can increase awareness and encourage more people to adopt eco-friendly practices, ultimately contributing to a healthier and more sustainable planet.
